channel.title: [Allstar] Allstar Beta Online | Higscors | vote4cash | & more
channel.description:
Hey guys,
It's me Rush n Skill and im hosting a server (beta)for digiimajor since he cant hold server im just doing it I hope you guys appriciate that( sorry bad english) Further this server is still beta and i'd understand if you think we should update more xD just take a lOOk :)
Features so far(coded by Rush n Skill): - Lottery draws every hour(if potsize is 300m or above) --> it looks like raffle FS - random money from mining, agility, thieving. - Gem stealing than cut it for cash. - custom train - custom home - chocolate bars in starter inv (heals 45 hp) - custom bosses.. - Rares(nice idea FS) - pirate title unlocks at 10k or more pirate kills(rares) - dupes are fixed & shops aswell so players cannot cheat in shops all around server. - real RS slayer - custom yell drop like: < rares drop > (playername) just received: -- 1 x (item) --. - Highscores - all skills working. - custom items drops that for example increases xp or coin farming at stalls - active community ( already 250+ accounts made & still counting)
&& lots more!
forum at: [url=http://w11.zetaboards.com/Allstar_Uria_Forums/index/]Forum[/url] client downlaod: [url=http://uppit.com/be5coyea9t9k/client_v1.22_beta.rar]uppit link[/url]
View pictures of server:
skeleton armour( boots slayer experience) [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/25tz1gp.png[/img]
Lottery (Costs 100m to enter) [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/iejo61.jpg[/img]
view skills in action(random coin stealing): [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/34fe1w7.png[/img]
& more pics will be added.
Rush n Skill ( forum developer & beta developer)

item.description:
@Roberty901 wrote:

Hey guys,

It’s me Rush n Skill and im hosting a server (beta)for digiimajor since he cant hold server im just doing it
I hope you guys appriciate that( sorry bad english)
Further this server is still beta and i’d understand if you think we should update more xD just take a lOOk

Features so far(coded by Rush n Skill):

  • Lottery draws every hour(if potsize is 300m or above) --> it looks like raffle FS
  • random money from mining, agility, thieving.
  • Gem stealing than cut it for cash.
  • custom train
  • custom home
  • chocolate bars in starter inv (heals 45 hp)
  • custom bosses…
  • Rares(nice idea FS)
  • pirate title unlocks at 10k or more pirate kills(rares)
  • dupes are fixed & shops aswell so players cannot cheat in shops all around server.
  • real RS slayer
  • custom yell drop like: < rares drop > (playername) just received: – 1 x (item) --.
  • Highscores
  • all skills working.
  • custom items drops that for example increases xp or coin farming at stalls
  • active community ( already 250+ accounts made & still counting)

&& lots more!
